name: Customizer Removal Options Panel (WP-CROP)
tagline: A WordPress plugin that removes all of or parts of Customizer based on user roles and more detailed options. Like Customizer Remove All Parts but not the nucelar option.
body:
### Welcome This plugin is under development. More information coming soon... ### Authors Andy Wilkerson [@AndyInTheWild](https://twitter.com/AndyInTheWild)
Jesse Petersen [@jpetersen](https://twitter.com/jpetersen)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
